fullText: This new production of 'My Fair Lady' is a handsome, well-sung revival that does full justice to one of the greatest of all American musicals.
dtliExcerpt: This new production of 'My Fair Lady' is a handsome, well-sung revival that does full justice to one of the greatest of all American musicals.

llmScore.reasoning: [ensemble-majority] | 3/4 models agree: Positive | Claude: Clear positive assessment with praise for the production quality and acknowledgment that it serves the source material well, though without extreme superlatives that would elevate to Rave. | GPT-4o: The review offers unqualified praise, describing the production as 'handsome' and 'well-sung', and states it 'does full justice' to a classic, indicating a strong recommendation. | Gemini: The review is highly positive, calling the production "handsome, well-sung" and stating that it "does full justice" to the musical, indicating a strong recommendation. | Kimi: The critic offers unqualified praise for the production, calling it handsome and well-sung, and stating it does full justice to the classic musical.
